item.title: 002 Sublimt Text4
item.description: 快捷键 ctrl+b (OSX) complie and run ctrl+enter new test ctrl+c (OSX) kill process ctrl+shift+b (OSX) run with debugger ctrl+d delete test ctrl+super+up/ctrl+super+down (OSX) swap tests cmd+k, cmd+p (OSX) close/open right panel Settings To edit settings press and type FastOlympicCoding: Open Settings cmd+shift+p (OSX) or Preferences — Package Settings — FastOlympicCoding

item.title: Hugo博客搭建记
item.description: 前述 网站构成: hugo + even + github actions , 参考资料: https://ouuan.github.io/post/from-hexo-to-hugo/ 搭建过程 Step 1 引自tom0727的搭建指南 首先阅读ouuan的指南，然后使用他的hugo模版，按照模版
